item.title: hilichurl ballad selection
item.description: volume i The masterpiece of the Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian! Scholar Jacob Musk will show you the mysterious spiritual world of the hilichurls through this poetry collection!

item.title: the boar princess
item.description: volume i A long, long time ago, in the forest kingdom… What legends occurred there? A story about friendship, love, and death.

item.title: the fox in the dandelion sea
item.description: volume i “Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land,” the Fox chants. An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox.

item.title: the mondstadt tower
item.description: volume i In the age of depression and tyranny, the outlander girl met the ominous orphan. Does this fateful encounter foretell a tragic ending?

item.title: the pale princess and the six pygmies
item.description: volume i A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This is part one, which tells the story of the Land of Night and the Moonlight Forest.

item.title: vera's melancholy
item.description: [!NOTE] üîñ i think the name ‚Äúvera‚Äù probably comes from words for ‚Äútruth‚Äù and ‚Äúbeing‚Äù / ‚Äúto be.‚Äù in this story, i wonder if vera represents the ‚Äútruth of this world‚Äù‚Äîor even more literally, the world itself.
